motds.title: Spotlight Series: Dominic Fike
motds.body: Watch a rebroadcast of Dominic Fike from our brand new studio in Los Angeles at the Main Stage on September 13 @ 1 AM ET & 1 PM ET.

motds.title: Stark Industries
motds.body: Explore Stark Industries, fight off enemy drones, and take on Tony Stark to power up your game with new super-powers!

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!
